verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
As the deer panted for the water
So my soul longs after Thee.

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
You alone are my heart desire
And I long to worship Thee

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
You alone are my strength, my shield
To you alone may my spirit yield

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines: And I long to worship Thee
